fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Mark a player each day.
- Ensnare two players each night, attack your last marked player if they visit one of them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If you reach two kills, your trap budget gets lower, and they only check if the target visited or not.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all evil threats to the Underdogs.
